en-US.summary: Carbon footprint will tell users the amount of carbon emitted due to various human actions.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask carbon footprint food emissions
Alexa ask carbon footprint emissions due to fuel
Alexa ask ask carbon footprint flight emissions
en-US.name: Carbon Footprint
en-US.description: This skill tells you the amount of carbon emitted due vrious human actions such as appliance usage, electricity usage, fuel, travelling through flights, trains, vehicles, due to food, agriculture, land and many more.
